objects.text:
• Includes 2 Pet Kitties
• Spinning Palm Tree & Hammock
• 9 Fun Accessories & Toys

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This cheerful and kid-friendly promotional banner features a bright product showcase aimed at children and toy buyers. The left half includes a softly colored gradient background with playful circular and wavy line accents. The text is arranged in a cascading hierarchy: the bold, playful **heading**, vibrant **subheading**, informative **description**, eye-catching **price**, and a striking call-to-action housed in a solid colored rectangle for the **cta_background** with overlay **cta** text. The right side displays the **product_image**—a colorful toy playset with animals. The design uses bold typefaces and a playful layout to capture attention and highlight benefits.

**Color Palette:**
- Lavender (#8A2BE2)
- Hot Pink (#FF69B4)
- Pale Pink Gradient (#FFF0F5 → #F8E6FF)
- Accent Pink Gradient (#FF9BBD → #FF69B4)
- Soft Mint Green (#A6E4D0)
- Light Purple (#BFA9DE)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and playful color palette ideal for children’s toys. The dominant colors include bright pink (#F45BAC) for the playhouse, light teal green (#50C2A8) for the grassy platform, and vivid purple (#B58BDE) for accents like the sign and turtle. Earthy beige (#F4C396) forms the base, while rich green (#1FB56A) highlights the leaves. Additional complementary colors include sky blue (#53C7E6), lavender (#D5A7F3), and candy red (#E52A59) seen in accessories and details. Colors are blended harmoniously yet contrast sharply to emphasize playfulness—bold colors are used adjacently to draw attention while maintaining a unified, cheerful theme.
